statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1001 AND current_stock < 10
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Chair'
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND reorder_level > 5;
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
